Package scaledmarkets.dabl.exec

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Executor
    A "back end" for a DABL compiler should implement this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Artifact  
    DablContext
    The execution context of the Dabl process.
    DefaultExecutor
    Determine which tasks should be executed, based on their 'when' conditions, and execute them.
    DependencyGraph
    Construct a dependency graph, that represents the input/output dependencies among the tasks.
    DockerTaskContainer
    Provides ability to control a container, in which a TaskExecutor is running.
    ExpressionContext
    Runtime context in which a Dabl expression is evaluated.
    ExpressionEvaluator  
    PretendTaskContainer
    Used by TaskSimulatorFactory for simulating task execution.
    Task  
    TaskContainer
    Provides ability to control a container, in which a TaskExecutor is running.
    TaskContainerFactory  
    TaskContext
    The execution context of the task.
    TaskDockerContainerFactory  
    TaskExecutor
    For executing a DABL task inside of a container.
    TaskSimulatorFactory
    For creating task containers in simulation mode, whereby containers are not actually created, and tasks are not actually executed.
